title: SOLD - N300 Mayo Tommy McCarthy - SGC No Grade
author: yanksfandboll20

posts.post_title: SOLD - N300 Mayo Tommy McCarthy - SGC No Grade
posts.post_content:
Purchased this on here a little while ago. Was hoping for an SGC A slab, but they sent it back as cannot / do not grade. I assume this is due to the combination of the bottom tab missing and none of the black still on the back. 

Looking for $200 shipped which is a little less than I paid. Thanks!
